item.title: A Tale of Creative Destruction
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: The early Counting Crows hit “Mr. Jones” was a lie. Take that backâ€”the incident was real, and Adam Duritz did hang out with a guy with the last name Jones, but the song’s whole plotline about how they were gonna be happier when they were famous didn’t come to pass. If you go to a Counting Crows show these days, in fact, the lyric is now “we all wanna be big, big stars, yeah, but then we get second thoughts about that.
